abstract: The 49ers are on the cusp of returning to the Super Bowl for the first time since the 2012 season.
lead_paragraph: Leviâ€™s Stadium opened to great fanfare in 2014, but the building has largely been a house of horrors for its primary tenant, the San Francisco 49ers. This year, the team has finally arrived, going 13-3 in the regular season and winning its first playoff game in Santa Clara last weekend.
